subject: Re: [junit] Re: Junit task and JUnitReport task failing
msgSnippet: ... Please read the entire error message, which includes numerous common problems. Investigate them all. If necessary, run ANT from the command line to see the
messageBody:
bhutkar@... wrote:

> it says not able to find junit task: what could be the problem here?

Please read the entire error message, which includes numerous common
problems. Investigate them all. If necessary, run ANT from the command
line to see the entire error.

Typically, your ANT run-time class path is wrong. It doesn't include
JUnit or the ANT optional tasks.
--
